reviews.title: Amazing for the price
reviews.review_text: Actually pretty great. Love everything about it. It's a simple webcam that works great for being on camera for meetings. It's nothing fancy, but it gets the job done well and easily. Microphone built in makes talking easy. Flip up cover for privacy. This little thing is actually quite great for the price.

reviews.title: Buy your very own spyware right here.
reviews.review_text: This micro phone scares me. I turn it off and later on it turns itself back on. I experimented with it and I just have to unplug it now when I'm not using it. Got me paranoid someone or something is listening from it.

I was very impressed with a review of this product and so I ordered it... The product came with very little documentation. It is NOT "Plug and Play" so it is not a seamless operation. And when I downloaded what app I was told to download in order to use it, it gave my system a virus, which took me 5 hours to get rid of. I do not recommend this, and, in fact, I will be changing my review of the reviewer too.

This did not work as soon as I plugged it in it never had a light that came on. It never alerted my computer that it was plugged in. I got a refund would never buy this again. It was a giant hassle to wait on it for it to not work. Do not recommend.

reviews.title: Totally worth it

It‚Äôs a nice camera to have for those who have laptops with no built in camera. Though it sometimes doesn‚Äôt work when a camera should be ‚Äúon‚Äù. That might be an issue with the site however but overall it‚Äôs a decent product.

reviews.title: Pretty good, Not 1080p

Can be a bit grainy, 720p i believe, it says its 1080p but i have yet to get it to do 1080p 2k. And im using an Nvidia geForce 1650 graphics card, not the best but certainly not even close to the worst. All in all i do like the camera it does mostly wat it says so im ok with it.
